page.title: 07FRINTON ON SEA - TRADE
page.content: The main shops are in Connaught Avenue.You can buy almost anything. There are many high order shops(shops you do not go to very often)and low order shops(shops you go to every day)e.g. Supermarkets, delicatessen, cake shops.In Frinton it is very easy to park your cars. Shopkeepers try to give personal and'old-fashioned'service. Each customer is treated individually and courtesy.Shopkeepers emphasise the quality of their goods. For example the butchers are'purveyors of fine meat'.'Fine foods' are sold at the delicatessen.'Exclusive'and'Elegant' clothes sold at the dress shops. Certain shops are not allowed in Frinton.There are no candy-floss stalls or fish and chip shops. There are no pubs although one hotel does have a public bar.
